title: OpenCode Teams Plugin (v1.0)
description: Advanced Agent Coordination Framework for OpenCode. Implements state management, long-polling, task dependencies, and a Tmux session manager.

title: US-001: Centralized State Management & Concurrency
description:
Implement centralized state storage (~/.config/opencode-teams/), advisory file locking (fcntl), and atomic writes.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Storage at ~/.config/opencode-teams/
- File locking using fcntl
- Atomic write operations
- mise run lint passes
- mise run typecheck passes
- bun test passes

title: US-002: Inbox Protocol & Long-Polling
description:
Implement poll_inbox tool with long-polling support and JSON-based persistence.

Acceptance Criteria:
- poll_inbox tool implemented
- Long-polling mechanism
- Messaging persistence
- mise run lint passes
- mise run typecheck passes
- bun test passes

title: US-003: Task System with Dependency Tracking
description:
Implement task schema with id, status, owner, and dependencies tracking.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Task schema includes dependencies
- CRUD for tasks
- Dependency validation logic
- mise run lint passes
- mise run typecheck passes
- bun test passes

title: US-004: Soft Blocking in Task Claiming
description:
Implement claim_task tool with warnings for unmet dependencies (Soft Blocking).

Acceptance Criteria:
- claim_task checks dependencies

- mise run lint passes
- mise run typecheck passes
- bun test passes

title: US-005: Global CLI opencode-teams
